main event: A round, ballistic, very brilliant, fast-moving disc craft was observed traversing due east.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes., The object moved rapidly eastward and could not have been a balloon despite initial speculation., Witnesses reported that aircraft were encountered in the area after the sighting., The object exhibited brilliant brightness which was noted due to sunset conditions., The course of the object was from southeast to northwest.
witness description: a student and observer on duty
